entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023
